short_summary: CONCEPTION DUNE MAISON \\u00bf LOT 89, QIKIKTARJUAQ, NUNAVUT
description: This contract is for the conception of a house in Qikktarjuaq, Nunavut. The house will have three bedrooms and be located on lot 89. The project will be completed by March 31, 2026. The contract is worth [insert cost here] that the service of a consultant will be required to have it done.
full_summary:
Contract Title: Design of a House Lot 89, Qikqtarjuaq, Nunavut
Contract Reference Number: 5P468-23-0089/A
Posting Date: June 21, 2023

The Department of Parks Canada is soliciting a proposal for the design of a three-bedroom house located in Qikiqtarjuaq, Nunavut. The successful bidder will be required to provide professional engineering services for the project, including architectural services.

Bid Opening Date: July 25th, 2023, at 2:00:00 PM Eastern Time
Bid Evaluation Criteria: Technical Merit (30%) and Price (70%)
Screening: Pre-qualification of Bidders based on the following criteria: Eligibility of Inc. as an Inuit- owned business and the firm's experience in providing architectural engineering services.

Bidders may submit their proposal through facsimile or email. Bids received by fax and email will be accepted as official. The downloadable solicitation package can be accessed at

Questions regarding this solicitation should be directed to: Christine Piché, Contract Officer Email: Eligibility of Bidder: The successful bidder must meet the eligibility criteria as outlined in the Pre-Qualification Questionnaire. The Bidder must be a Canadian Business (more specifically an Inuit-owned Business as per the Application of an Inuit-Owned Business as defined in the Master Vec Seward Agreement (MVSA) and have an active profile in the Government of Canada’s online procurement system.
